## Piggy Piggy

A financial tracking app designed to help you manage your savings goals and track your spending habits.

### Features

- Track daily expenses
- Set and monitor savings goals
- Visual progress tracking
- Customizable categories
- Data export capabilities

Piggy Piggy respects your privacy. All data is stored locally on your device unless you choose to enable cloud sync.
